mapper.select: /* com.sgg.application.login.mapper.LoginMapper.login */ SELECT A1.USER_ID , A1.USER_NM , A1.USER_AUTH , (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 then 'Y' ELSE 'N' END FROM SGG_USER WHERE USER_PW = #{userPw}) AS PASSWORD_CHECK , A2.TEL_NO , A2.CITY , A2.EMAIL , A2.GEN , A2.COUNTRY , A2.ZIP , A2.ADDR , A2.ADDR_DTL FROM SGG_USER A1 , SGG_USER_INFO A2 WHERE 1 = 1 AND A1.USER_ID = A2.USER_ID(+) AND A1.USER_ID = #{userId} AND A1.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A2.DEL_YN(+) = 'N'
